workflow: Register a new user, login, and check account overview

trace.thought: The goal is to register a new user, login, and check account overview. I am currently on the ParaBank Home page, which is the login screen. The first step is to register a new user. I will click the 'Register' link to navigate to the registration page.

The goal is to register a new user, log in, and check the account overview. The history shows that I have already clicked on the 'Register' link. Now I need to fill out the registration form. I will start with the first name field.

The goal is to register a new user, login, and check account overview. The history shows that I have already clicked the 'Register' link and filled the registration form. Now I need to click the 'Register' button to submit the form and create the account. According to the learned rules, after clicking 'Register', I should wait for `text="Your account was created successfully"`.

The goal is to register a new user, login, and check account overview. The history shows that I have already clicked the 'Register' link, filled the registration form, and clicked the register button. Now I need to verify that the registration was successful and then proceed to login. According to the learned rules, after registration, I am already logged in. So, I should proceed to check the account overview.

The goal is to register a new user, login, and check account overview. The history shows that I have already clicked on the 'Register' link, filled the registration form, clicked the register button, and clicked the 'Home' button. Now I need to login with the registered username and password and check the account overview. I am currently on the home page, so I need to fill in the username and password fields and click the 'Log In' button.

The goal is to register a new user, login, and check account overview. The history shows that I have already clicked the register button, filled the registration form, clicked the register button again, clicked the home button, and filled something. Now I need to login. I will fill the username and password fields and click the login button.

The goal is to register a new user, login, and check account overview. The history shows that I have already clicked the register button, filled the registration form, clicked the register button again, clicked the home button, and filled the username and password fields. Now I need to click the login button to login. According to the knowledge bank, I should use the locator `page.locator("input[value='Log In']")` to click the login button.

The goal is to register a new user, login, and check account overview. The history shows that I have already clicked on the 'Register' link, filled the registration form, clicked the register button, clicked the 'Home' button, filled the username and password fields, and clicked the login button. Now I need to check the account overview. Since I am already logged in after registration, I should navigate to the 'Accounts Overview' page to check the account overview.
